text: The Hain Celestial Group, Inc. is an international food and personal-care company. It is based in the United States. It was founded in 1993 as Hain Food Group. It changed its name to Hain Celestial Group after merging with Celestial Seasonings in 2000. It is publicly traded on the NASDAQ with brands that include Ella's Kitchen, Frank Cooper's, and Linda McCartney Foods. Category:American food companies Category:1993 establishments in the United States
title: Hain Celestial Group
